restartText: You've been blown to pieces! Want to try the level again?

text.text: Hello. Would you like to be part of an experiment?

replies.text: Will I get my stolen item back?

text.text: I appreciate your enthusiasm.
This is my most fiendish invention yet.
Yes, you stumbled across my testing grounds.
Ah, but what you don't know is that this field has two of my super mines!
They are mines so powerful that they affect the numbers around them, causing the numbers two spaces away to be one greater.
text.reply: And the numbers next to them?

text.text: The numbers directly next to them are unaffected.
Now these are still a work in progress, so they give off a slight yellow aura. So if the space is yellow, you are in range.
text.reply: Yellow numbers might be larger, got it.

text.text: Very good! Thank you for testing this!
text.reply: Wait, did I really have a choice?

text.text: No, of course not. Good luck!
Too bad. As a villain, I find that unenthusiastic volunteers make the best ones.

replies.text: Sigh. Ok, tell me about this experiment.

text.text: Probably not, but you will need to get through this to get to my tower.

replies.text: Of course. So what is this experiment?

text.text: This is my most fiendish invention yet.
Yes, you stumbled across my testing grounds.
Ah, but what you don't know is that this field has two of my super mines!
They are mines so powerful that they affect the numbers around them, causing the numbers two spaces away to be one greater.
text.reply: And the numbers next to them?

text.text: The numbers directly next to them are unaffected.
Now these are still a work in progress, so they give off a slight yellow aura. So if the space is yellow, you are in range.
text.reply: Yellow numbers might be larger, got it.

text.text: Very good! Thank you for testing this!
text.reply: Wait, did I really have a choice?

text.text: No, of course not. Good luck!
